Parameters: float
float: The x-coordinate of the center
float
float: The y-coordinate of the center
int[]
int: The sRGB colors to be distributed between around the center. There must be at least 2 colors in the array. This value must never be null.
float[]

float: May be NULL. The relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array, beginning with 0 and ending with 1.0. If the values are not monotonic, the drawing may produce unexpected results. If positions is NULL, then the colors are automatically spaced evenly. This value may be null.
SweepGradient(float,float,int[],float[]).Description: A Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.
SweepGradient(float,float,int[],float[]).FullName: public SweepGradient (float cx, float cy, int[] colors, float[] positions)

Parameters: float
float: The x-coordinate of the center
float
float: The y-coordinate of the center
long[]
long: The colors to be distributed between around the center. There must be at least 2 colors in the array. This value must never be null.
float[]

float: May be NULL. The relative position of each corresponding color in the colors array, beginning with 0 and ending with 1.0. If the values are not monotonic, the drawing may produce unexpected results. If positions is NULL, then the colors are automatically spaced evenly. This value may be null.
Throws: if there are less than two colors, the colors do not share the same @B_android#graphics#ColorSpace_E@ or do not use a valid one, or positions is not null and has a different length from colors.
SweepGradient(float,float,long[],float[].Description: A Shader that draws a sweep gradient around a center point.
